item.title: How to make "master" command for admins +?
item.dc:creator: @IloveNOAH IloveNOAH
item.description:
@IloveNOAH wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:10, topic:426857”][quote author=IloveNOAH link=topic=529554.msg3864959#msg3864959 date=1324937642]
Nope dosent work

[/quote]

Did you read what i said?

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master" && playerrights = 3)) {
                                for (int i = 0; i < 22; i++) {
                                        c.playerLevel[i] = 99;
                                        c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100);
                                        c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);       
                                }
                                c.getPA().requestUpdates();
                        }

I’M GOING TO TYPE IN ALL CAPS SO YOU CAN UNDERSTAND. You’ll need to edit what I put in, THIS IS NOT YOUR CONDITION. You need to look at other commands with the condition and use one of them for it.[/quote]
Still… don’t work…

Read full topic

item.title: How to make "master" command for admins +?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Gizcat, post:5, topic:426857”] if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master") { for (int i = 0; i < 23; i++) { c.playerLevel[i] = 99; c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.getPA().refreshSkill(i); } }
I ripped this out of PI for you.

There’s a couple simple things to add that should help you get used to PI.[/quote]

I fixed that for you, I already gave him one which was 5x better.

item.source: How to make "master" command for admins +?

item.title: How to make "master" command for admins +?
item.dc:creator: @Gizcat Gizcat
item.description:
@Gizcat wrote:

if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master") {
for (int i = 0; i < 23; i++) {
                c.playerLevel[i] = 99;
                c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100);
                c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);
            }
}

I wrote this in a text box and tested with chrome.exe.

There’s a couple simple things to add that should help you get used to PI.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make "master" command for admins +?
item.dc:creator: @IloveNOAH IloveNOAH
item.description:
@IloveNOAH wrote:

public void master() { for(int i = 0; i < 7; i++) { addSkillXP(14000000, i); }
Where do I put that in?
My is

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master")) { for (int i = 0; i < 22; i++) { c.playerLevel[i] = 99; c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.getPA().refreshSkill(i); } c.getPA().requestUpdates(); }

Read full topic

for(int i = 0; i < 7; i++) {
addSkillXP(13800000, i);
}
